game.name: Pocket Flight
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Stats, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fly your own way in Pocket Flight — a cozy endless flight adventure! Explore dynamic biomes, face shifting weather, customize your plane, and take on daily challenges. Relaxing skies, infinite horizons — ready for takeoff?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fly your own way in Pocket Flight — a cozy endless flight adventure! Explore dynamic biomes, face shifting weather, customize your plane, and take on daily challenges. Relaxing skies, infinite horizons — ready for takeoff?
